p: While CCE is important to all education levels, from primary schools to universities ( Harker-Schuch 2019), higher education marks itself distinct in its role in deepening knowledge (Radaković et al. 2017; Vettori and Rammel 2014), inspiring scientifically rigorous expertise (Anderson 2012), and teaching the skills of integration, synthesis, and systems-thinking to cope with complex problems in confronting sustainability challenges (Stephens et al. 2008).
